content.html: Idk why royalists always think ‘what Would you replace the monarch with? President {current prime minister}?’ Is their gotcha argument. Yeah, I would take a president I don’t like, because that’s what a freakin democracy is. Not some inbreeds chosen by their imaginary friend.
content.value:
Idk why royalists always think ‘what Would you replace the monarch with? President {current prime minister}?’ Is their gotcha argument.
Yeah, I would take a president I don’t like, because that’s what a freakin democracy is. Not some inbreeds chosen by their imaginary friend.
